tagline.title: KINTAMANI BESAKIH TOUR IS A BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO FROM KINTAMANI VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING BESAKIH TEMPLE IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: KINTAMANI BESAKIH TOUR IS A BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO FROM KINTAMANI VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING BESAKIH TEMPLE IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: KINTAMANI BESAKIH TOUR IS A BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO FROM KINTAMANI VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING BESAKIH TEMPLE IN BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali Kintamani Besakih Tour is Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy Visit Kintamani Village with breathtaking view of an active volcano of Mount Batur and view of Lake Batur and then continue to visit the Besakih temple as a the biggest and mother temple in Bali islands. Is a tour that combines the natural beauty of views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur and ends by visiting the largest temple on the island of Bali, namely Besakih temple with all the beauty and sacredness of this temple. First we will watch the barong and keris dance in Batubulan village with a duration of one hour show by bringing the story of the war between good and evil, proceed to the Goa Gajah temple site, a historical site where we can see ancient relics between Hinduism and Buddhism. , proceed to kintamani to see the view of Mount Batur which is very enchanting and we will enjoy lunch here with a stunning view of Mount Batur volcano from the restaurant, after lunch proceed to Besakih Temple to see the greatness of the largest temple accompanied by by a local guide as long as you see the beauty of this Besakih temple, proceed to Kerta Gosa to see the historic site that was formerly used as an ancient court building and there are various carvings that adorn this place, proceed back to the hotel with a very pleasant experience. impressive and memorable during the one-day tour to kintamani and besakih, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make this tour more enjoyable
description.html: Bali Kintamani Besakih Tour is Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy Visit Kintamani Village with breathtaking view of an active volcano of Mount Batur and view of Lake Batur and then continue to visit the Besakih temple as a the biggest and mother temple in Bali islands. Is a tour that combines the natural beauty of views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur and ends by visiting the largest temple on the island of Bali, namely Besakih temple with all the beauty and sacredness of this temple. First we will watch the barong and keris dance in Batubulan village with a duration of one hour show by bringing the story of the war between good and evil, proceed to the Goa Gajah temple site, a historical site where we can see ancient relics between Hinduism and Buddhism. , proceed to kintamani to see the view of Mount Batur which is very enchanting and we will enjoy lunch here with a stunning view of Mount Batur volcano from the restaurant, after lunch proceed to Besakih Temple to see the greatness of the largest temple accompanied by by a local guide as long as you see the beauty of this Besakih temple, proceed to Kerta Gosa to see the historic site that was formerly used as an ancient court building and there are various carvings that adorn this place, proceed back to the hotel with a very pleasant experience. impressive and memorable during the one-day tour to kintamani and besakih, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make this tour more enjoyable

title.title: Barong Dance Performance | Kintamani and Besakih Tour

image.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour  | Barong Dance Performance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Probably the most well known dance, it is also another story telling dance, narrating the fight between good and evil. We will see this dance during Kintamani Besakih Tour. Barong and Kris dance like the kecak dance the Barong and Kris dance is a battle between good and evil spirit. Barong can take various forms but in this dance he takes the form of the dance Barong Keket, the most holy of the Barongs. The Barong Keket is a strange creature, half shaggy dog, half lion and is played by two men in much the same way as a circus clown-horse. His opponent is the witch Rangda. The fight between Barong and Rangda is also the topic of traditional narratives, usually performed in the temple of the dead.

title.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour | Goa Gajah Temple (Elephant Cave Temple)

image.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour | Goa Gajah Temple (Elephant Cave Temple) | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Goa Gajah is a historical site that has a high historical value, where there are relics from antiquity, about the history of the meeting between Hinduism and Buddhism, which can be seen from some of the historical relics found in this place. The word of Goa Gajah is anticipated coming from the word of Lwa Gajah, the name of Buddhist Temple or hermitage for Buddhist monk. Based on archeological findings as mentioned above, it can be known the Goa Gajah Temple is derived from the ninth to eleventh centuries AD. In the past, it served as a monastery of Buddhist monk and Shivite priest. This conservatism also shows the unification of Buddhism and Shiva went well

title.title: Kintamani Village for Volcano View | Kintamani Besakih Tour
title.text: Kintamani Village view Mount Batur Volcano
title.html: Kintamani Village view Mount Batur Volcano

image.title: Kintamani Besakih Tour | Kintamani Village for Volcano View | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of countryside located in the hill and the beautiful panorama surround it. We can see beautiful panorama from Kintamani to overview the active volcano of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. When we stand up at Kintamani, we will be able to see the rural area which is close to the lake. Kintamani is the object of mountain tourism is very unique and stunning, with cool air condition in the daytime and cold at night. To reach these locations can be taken through the journey overland from Denpasar for 2 hours, exactly to the place called Penelokan in Kintamani District. In accordance with its name in Balinese, Penelokan means most strategic place to see the sights of nature in this tourist location.

title.title: Besakih Temple | Kintamani and Besakih Tour

image.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour | Besakih Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Besakih Temple known that since the 15th century, The first recorded mention of its existence is from an inscription that dates from 1007 A.D. Since the Gelgel dynasty of the fifteenth century it has been regarded as a central, holy temple for the entire island. It was regarded as the central temple of Hinduism in Bali. Besakih Temple also known as Pura Penataran Agung, is Bali's main place of worship, a complex comprising twenty-two temples set on parallel ridges. This complex expresses the essential belief of the Balinese known as Tri Hita Kirana, meaning that life on earth must be lived and kept in balance and harmony between man and God, man and society and his fellow human beings, and man and his natural environment.
description.html: Besakih Temple known that since the 15th century, The first recorded mention of its existence is from an inscription that dates from 1007 A.D. Since the Gelgel dynasty of the fifteenth century it has been regarded as a central, holy temple for the entire island. It was regarded as the central temple of Hinduism in Bali. Besakih Temple also known as Pura Penataran Agung, is Bali's main place of worship, a complex comprising twenty-two temples set on parallel ridges. This complex expresses the essential belief of the Balinese known as Tri Hita Kirana, meaning that life on earth must be lived and kept in balance and harmony between man and God, man and society and his fellow human beings, and man and his natural environment.

title.title: Kerta Gosa Ancient Justice Court Palace | Kintamani and Besakih Tour
title.text: Kerta Gosa Ancient Justice Court Palace
title.html: Kerta Gosa Ancient Justice Court Palace

image.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour | Kerta Gosa Ancient Justice Court Palace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kerta Gosa Ancient Justice Court Palace is an ancient building designed with Balinese architecture which is consists of two buildings (bale), namely akerta Gosa Bale and Bale Kambang. Bale Kambang called because the building is surrounded by a pond that is Gili Park. The uniqueness Kerta Gosa with Bale Kambang this is surface on the ceiling or roof bale is decorated with traditional painting style of Kamasan (a village in Klungkung) or style of puppet that is very popular in the community Bali. Initially, the paintings that decorate the ceiling are made of cloth and parba. New since 1930 is replaced and created at the top of the plasterboard direstorasi ago according to the original image is still intact and up to now

price.title: Kintamani and Besakih Tour Price :
price.content:
Kintamani and Besakih Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Kintamani Besakih Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 800,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Ticket Barong Dance Performance + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Watching Barong and Keris Dance Performance
Visit Goa Gajah Temple
Visit Kintamani View Mount Batur
Lunch at Kintamani with view Volcano

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
